text: I find the whole use of #COVID19 "Grandma Killers" so offensive - they could easily have given everyone in the #NursingHomes a low dose of #chloroquine #HCQ - and people in a nursing home are by very definition, medically fragile - it's just too much misinformation #scary 😰😬 https://t.co/jjlycPHB4s https://t.co/0YKSWRsBdk
